parameters: Please take care of that child.
You, are you this child's new friend?
Thank you for being her friend.
I wonder how much that child will continue
Fufu, I look forward to finding out.
Well, we're not friends, but yeah.
I don't want to see the likes of you.
What, does the sight of my boobs
You are a bad influence to the children.
What a disgrace of a Demon Dog!
What, you afraid all of your little
pups will have bigger boobs than you?
They don't seem to get along.
I think they get along just fine.
Thank you for being her friend.
I wonder how much that child will continue
Fufu, I look forward to finding out.
You mean the ones behind you?
I am known as Barnu sometimes, so call me as such.
...Do the others here not have names?
At least the kids around here don't.
Though some do name themselves once in a while.
Well, I can tell everyone apart from their face anyway.
It's not that much of a bother.
Oi, what are you all talking about!?
Isn't woof's journey more important here!?
Oh, I didn't mean it like that. It's just...
Being dragged into it is a little sudden, is it?
You know the situation here already?
It was the same the last time.
Figured it'd be the same this time.
If it's the other way around, we might do it.
Ah, you mean you want to have this girl
I mean, we're also searching for allies, too.
Don't understand, but will woof get to travel?
...The land outside, Tantali of Departure, is only meant
for those approved to step foot inside it.
This girl is simply incapable of such a feat.
So now the question becomes, can you fill the gap
between her power and what is required?
Even if you say that, we won't know how
strong we have to be if we can't see Tantali
Isn't there some kind of approval test?
If you can beat it, you can leave,
With friends, we'll fix problem in the Village Well!
What's the problem with the well?
Something dangerous has taken residence there.
It's attacked our children once or twice, long ago.
Which means we just have to defeat it, right?
I'd have to take care of it normally, but...
Well, I'm not well-versed to water.
Dog types are weak to Water attributes.
That should mean this kid too, though.
If you can take care of it, I'll let you leave.
She ran off that way, and all.
Your comrades── and above all, you,
seem to be much stronger than I imagined.
No, I want to give you one piece of advice.
The southern grasslands are really dangerous places.
Does it mean departure from this world, hm?
Not that much, but also not off the mark.
I just want you to be prepared to never return again.
I suppose it is fine, then.
Maybe this one doesn't know what "being ready"
She's a little naive, but she's smarter than she looks.
I feel like that's an overestimation.
I leave this girl's fate in your capable hands.
and one day, she'll return safely.
I have something for you to celebrate your departure...
In other words, we decide when to depart.
we happen to have other goals, too.
I'll leave it to you, though.
Woof waited all this time, after all.
Next time woof will help you!
Certainly, she's not a dumb one.
I look forward to working with you from now on.
Let's not use someone else's, though.
・A Demon Dog is in the party.
Would you like to view the Scene [Like-minded]?
\C[17]※The Scene will enter Recollection regardless of choice.\C[0]
Fufufu, have you finally given up?
We journeyed past Tantali of Departure...
And after heading through the southern forest,
Woofy here played a huge part in the
deserving of some praise, I'd say.
A long time ago, I was on my own journey,
and I came across a being that took the form
Just that alone made her very happy.
She was bound to have many more such encounters,
I said so at the time.
And having said it, I have to take responsibility.
So I became the chief of this village, and
continued to tell the story of that journey.
So the rumors about the treasure hunt
I don't remember saying that, but,
well, stories tend to be exaggerated.
That too must be the power of emotions.
So, does that mean your journey is over?
It'll continue on and on always!
